name: Developer Hub Dark
description: Replaces the current Developer Hub theme with a dark theme that is easy on the eyes.
additional_info: Turn off the lights in the new Roblox Developer Hub with this style! View the Roblox API Reference and Tutorial pages with a theme that is easy on the eyes. This style is a work in progress and will be updated to fix some bugs! Known bugs are: - Autocomplete/swiftype widget has some white remnants Also removes the blue border on the side of the pages to allow more things to fit on the page. Created by joritochip on 6/28/2018

discussions.name: I made this theme. For fun here's a comparison between them.
